summary: Implements a diffusion pipeline that performs image inpainting by encoding an input image and mask, generating text and controlnet embeddings, running a Flux transformer denoising process conditioned on the mask and prompts, and decoding the latent output back to a completed image.
business_intent: Provides a tool for creators and developers to automatically fill or modify missing regions in images using natural language guidance and optional control signals, facilitating content creation, visual effects, and image restoration workflows.
